items.text: when you press the rotate button, each of the images is rotated  around its center, while maintaining its position in the center of the  region on the screen.
items.href: Android Rotate and Scale Bitmap Example - DZone Mobile

items.text: the code in onclick finds the two views in its layout and sets  properties that control the amount of rotation, size of the bitmap, and x  and y offsets.
items.href: Android Rotate and Scale Bitmap Example - DZone Mobile

items.text: that is done because rotation is around the  top left point (the origin) of the view.
items.href: Android Rotate and Scale Bitmap Example - DZone Mobile
